channel.title: Using With Docker on TinyGo
channel.description: Recent content in Using With Docker on TinyGo

item.title: Using TinyGo with Docker
item.description: A docker container exists for easy access to the TinyGo CLI. For example, to compile wasm.wasm for the WebAssembly example, from the root of the repository: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src tinygo/tinygo tinygo build -o /src/wasm.wasm -target wasm examples/wasm To compile blinky1.hex targeting an ARM microcontroller, such as the PCA10040: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src tinygo/tinygo tinygo build -o /src/blinky1.hex -size=short -target=pca10040 examples/blinky1 To compile blinky1.hex targeting an AVR microcontroller such as the Arduino:
